data.comment: B. Munich kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Frankfurt drives forward and Daichi Kamada gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 2, Throw-in B. Munich.
Ball goes out of play for a B. Munich goal kick.
Lucas Hernandez is on a sub for Alphonso Davies for B. Munich.
In the minute 4, Frankfurt's Steven Zuber breaks free at Allianz Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
Thomas Muller for B. Munich gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 5, Markus Schmidt awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
In Munich, Kingsley Coman of B. Munich is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 9, Frankfurt have a goal kick.
B. Munich take a 1-0 lead thanks to Robert Lewandowski.
That's a fine assist from Kingsley Coman.
In the minute 11, Almamy Toure of Frankfurt is pulled up for offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Munich.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
In the minute 15, Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andre Silva for Frankfurt is whistled offside.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of B. Munich.
Leon Goretzka (B. Munich) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
B. Munich's Leon Goretzka gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Frankfurt defender.
In the minute 18, Andre Silva for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
B. Munich's Thomas Muller is whistled for offside at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 24, Markus Schmidt blows against B. Munich's Douglas Costa for offside.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
Great finish from Robert Lewandowski to give B. Munich a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 26, Great play from Joshua Kimmich to set up the goal.
B. Munich needs to be cautious. Frankfurt have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 28, Frankfurt drive forward but Andre Silva is judged offside.
Markus Schmidt signals a Frankfurt throw-in in B. Munich's half.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Frankfurt just outside B. Munich's area.
In the minute 31, Frankfurt's Almamy Toure attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Munich.
Markus Schmidt awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Joshua Kimmich (B. Munich) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Munich B. Munich attack through Robert Lewandowski. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
Andre Silva (Frankfurt) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Markus Schmidt awards B. Munich a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In Munich Frankfurt drive forward through Sebastian Rode. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
In the minute 37, Free kick B. Munich.
B. Munich's Robert Lewandowski gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 42, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Important block from the Frankfurt defence as Thomas Muller fires in a strike for B. Munich.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for B. Munich close to the penalty box.
Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 45, Jerome Boateng (B. Munich) has received a first yellow card.
The second half is underway in Munich - Frankfurt with the kick-off.
Throw-in for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
The away team replace Steven Zuber with Timothy Chandler.
In the minute 46, Amin Younes is replacing Daichi Kamada for the away team.
Joshua Kimmich is booked for the home team.
In the minute 47, In Munich, Almamy Toure (Frankfurt) misses the target with a header.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for B. Munich in Munich.
In the minute 49, Can B. Munich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Frankfurt's half?
Markus Schmidt signals a throw-in for Frankfurt, close to B. Munich's area.
In Munich a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Frankfurt.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Frankfurt.
Free kick B. Munich.
In the minute 53, Lucas Hernandez gets his shot on target but fails to score for B. Munich.
B. Munich have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
B. Munich's Kingsley Coman gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
In the minute 55, B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt at Allianz Arena.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
In the minute 57, Can B. Munich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Frankfurt's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
Frankfurt's Almamy Toure breaks free at Allianz Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 59, B. Munich have a goal kick.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
Robert Lewandowski puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
In the minute 60, Douglas Costa instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of B. Munich.
In the minute 63, Markus Schmidt awards the home team a throw-in.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
B. Munich are pushing forward but Lucas Hernandez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Frankfurt at Allianz Arena.
Markus Schmidt signals a B. Munich throw-in in Frankfurt's half.
B. Munich's Bouna Sarr misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Frankfurt at Allianz Arena.
Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Munich a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 67, Hans-Dieter Flick (B. Munich) is making a second substitution, with Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting replacing Robert Lewandowski.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Javi Martinez is replacing Thomas Muller for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
Hans-Dieter Flick is making the team's fourth substitution at Allianz Arena with Leroy Sane replacing Douglas Costa.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team have replaced Andre Silva with Danny Da Costa. This is the third substitution made today by Adi Hutter.
The away team have replaced Almamy Toure with Aymen Barkok. This is the fourth substitution made today by Adi Hutter.
In the minute 72, Goal! B. Munich extend their lead to 4-0 through Leroy Sane.
Bouna Sarr with an assist there.
Jamal Musiala is replacing Kingsley Coman for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 74, Frankfurt are caught offside.
Adi Hutter (Frankfurt) is making a fifth substitution, with Djibril Sow replacing Stefan Ilsanker.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 76, Frankfurt have a goal kick.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
In Munich Frankfurt's Amin Younes is caught offside.
In the minute 80, Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Frankfurt.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
In the minute 82, Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Frankfurt's Timothy Chandler has run offside.
In the minute 86, Leon Goretzka gets his shot on target but fails to score for B. Munich.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
Jamal Musiala of B. Munich smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 89, Markus Schmidt signals a Frankfurt throw-in in B. Munich's half.
Markus Schmidt blows against B. Munich's Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting for offside.
The second-half is over. The match ends 5-0.
Goal! Jamal Musiala extends B. Munich's lead to 5-0.
Great play from Leon Goretzka to set up the goal.
